sentences: A cat and a bat. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
A playful cat wears a big hat.
He wants to eat apple cake.
He goes to the apple tree.
The hat is too large, so he cannot climb up the tree.
A bat appears and says,'I will help.'
The bat grabs the apple.
The cat makes an apple cake.
The bat and the cat share the apple cake happily.
Benny The Bunny. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
Benny the Bunny has a big blue backpack.
He puts a bell, a basket, and a brush in the backpack.
Benny goes to the barn.
He brushes the horse and feeds it some hay.
Benny plays with the birds and the butterflies.
He sings a song and dances with joy.
Casey The Cat. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
Casey helps her mom cook,
She stirs the soup with a big spoon.
She adds carrots and celery.
Cooking together is fun.
Casey wipes the table neatly.
Helping her mom is sweet.
Later, they cuddle up to eat.
Casey loves her mom very much.
Danny The Dog. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
Danny the dog, off to school he strides.
Fetching toys with wagging sides.
With crayons, he draws, colors so bright.
Spinning and dancing, a joyful sight.
Sharing his toys, his heart full of cheer.
Attentive in class, his mind clear.
With hugs he gives, spreading joy each day.
In Danny's world, learning lights the way.
Ellie The Elephant. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
Ellie the elephant wears a big red hat.
She hops and skips, just like that!
Eating apples, she's full of cheer.
Exploring with nothing to fear.
Ellie meets Eddie, a friendly bear.
They laugh and play, without a care.
Every day with friends, is full of fun.
Ellie's happy adventures have just begun!.
Freddy The Fish. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
Freddy the fish dives in the sea's embrace.
Where Fiona, his friend, finds her place.
With playful flips and joyful hops.
They explore the ocean's hidden shops.
Together they seek food divine.
In the shimmering depths where treasures shine.
Through laughter and fun, their friendship is spun.
Fiona and Freddy, under the golden sun.
Gina The Goose. Sunny Friends tells a phonics story.
Gina the goose heads to school each day.
Excited to learn and ready to play.
With her paintbrush, she creates art so fine.
Laughing with friends, she shares her design.
Helpful and kind, Gina lends a hand.
Attentive in class, she understands.
At day's end, she spreads her wings with pride.
Flying home with joy, nowhere to hide.
Henry The Hedgehog. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
Henry the hedgehog hops with glee.
Helping at home, as busy as can be.
He hangs clothes up, with a joyful leap.
But a treasure falls out, from the heap.
With Mom by his side, he lends a hand.
Watching her mom closely, to understand.
At day's end, mom says 'Thank you'.
Henry hearing that, his smile wide.
Ivy The Iguana. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
Ivy the iguana, in her treehouse high.
Dreams of adventures, reaching the sky.
She sings and swings with joy and grace.
In her leafy haven, a magical place.
With colors and paints, she loves to create.
Crafting wonders, both big and great.
Her stories weave tales of delight.
Inspiring dreams under moon's soft light.
Jax The Jaguar. A phonics story is told by Sunny Friends.
Hello! I'm Jax, a cheerful jaguar.
I can jump all day.
Would you like to join with me?
Let's jump over a jar. It is easy!
Let's jump over a jacket. It is easy too!
Let's jump over a jet. It is too big!
Yay, we did it!
I love jumping. It brings me plenty of joy.
